messages.content: ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS is a custom node for ComfyUI that integrates the MARS5-TTS text-to-speech model.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS?
The purpose of ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS is to allow users to generate speech audio output from reference text and audio inputs using the MARS5-TTS model within the ComfyUI interface.
What are the inputs required for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS?
The inputs required for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS are a reference audio file and reference text.
What is the output of ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS?
The output of ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS is a generated speech audio file based on the provided reference audio and text.

To install ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS, you need to clone the repository into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ directory, navigate to the cloned directory, and run 'pip install -r requirements.txt'. The weights will be downloaded from Hugging Face.
Is there a tutorial available for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS?
Yes, there is a tutorial available for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS on BiliBili at the following link: https://b23.tv/etjjwVd.
Is there a QQ group for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS support?
Yes, there is a QQ group for ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS support, and the group number is 852228202.
